name: City Zombie Hunter
description:
Fight with zombies to shoot them with this amazing zombie shooting game. Shoot zombies and clear the city. If you are looking to play a game with dead zombies, just try this amazing zombie game with incredible game play with supper sound effects and realistic graphics

Features:
Realistic 3D graphics
Easy simple controls
Horrifying visuals and sound
Different in game missions
Variety of guns
Sniper killing missions
